SELECT SO.SCHE_OPIN_NO,SO.EMP_NO, EI.EMP_NAME || ' ' || EP.EMP_POSI_NAME AS EMP , TO_CHAR(SO.SCHE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SCHE_DATE,SO.SCHE_OPIN_CON FROM SCHE_OPIN SO INNER JOIN EMP_INFO EI ON SO.EMP_NO = EI.EMP_NO INNER JOIN EMP_POSI EP ON EI.EMP_POSI_NO = EP.EMP_POSI_NO WHERE SO.SCHE_NO = #{sche_no} AND SO.SCHE_OPIN_DEL_YN = 1 ORDER BY SO.SCHE_OPIN_NO DESC

SELECT SC.SCHE_NO, SC.SCHE_DIV_NO, SC.SCHE_ACTI_NO,CL.CLIENT_NAME ,SC.SCHE_IMPORTANCE, EI.EMP_NAME || ' ' || EP.EMP_POSI_NAME AS NAME FROM SCHE SC INNER JOIN EMP_INFO EI ON SC.EMP_NO = EI.EMP_NO INNER JOIN EMP_POSI EP ON EI.EMP_POSI_NO = EP.EMP_POSI_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN SCHE_CLIENT_INFO SCI ON SC.SCHE_NO = SCI.SCHE_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN CLIENT CL ON SCI.CLIENT_NO = CL.CLIENT_NO WHERE SC.DEL_YN = 1 ORDER BY SC.SCHE_NO DESC
SELECT CODE_S_CATE, CODE_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE_L_CATE = 2

SELECT CODE_S_CATE, CODE_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE_L_CATE = 3
AND CODE_S_CATE IN(0,1,2,3)
AND CODE_S_CATE IN(0,1,2,3)

SELECT * FROM(SELECT C.CLIENT_NO , C.CLIENT_NAME , C2.COMP_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CLIENT_NO ASC) AS RNUM FROM CLIENT C INNER JOIN COMP C2 ON C.COMP_NO = C2.COMP_NO) Z WHERE Z.RNUM BETWEEN #{startCnt} AND #{endCnt}
AND (CLIENT_NAME LIKE'%' || #{searchTxt} || '%' OR COMP_NAME LIKE'%' || #{searchTxt} || '%')

SELECT * FROM(SELECT LEAD_NO, LEAD_NAME, EMP_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY LEAD_NO ASC) AS RNUM FROM LEAD LD INNER JOIN EMP_INFO EI ON LD.EMP_NO = EI.EMP_NO) Z WHERE Z.RNUM BETWEEN #{startCnt} AND #{endCnt}
AND (LEAD_NAME LIKE'%' || #{searchTxt} || '%' OR EMP_NAME LIKE'%' || #{searchTxt} || '%')

SELECT * FROM(SELECT CHN_NO,CHN_NAME,EMP_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CHN_NO ASC) AS RNUM FROM BSS_CHN BC INNER JOIN EMP_INFO EI ON BC.EMP_NO = EI.EMP_NO) Z WHERE Z.RNUM BETWEEN #{startCnt} AND #{endCnt}
AND (CHN_NAME LIKE'%' || #{searchTxt} || '%' OR EMP_NAME LIKE'%' || #{searchTxt} || '%')

SELECT CC.CODE_NAME AS CN ,CD.CODE_NAME AS DN, EI.TEAM_NO,'(' || SUBSTR(SCHE_PLACE,'0','5') || ')' || REPLACE(SUBSTR(SCHE_PLACE,'6'),',',' ') AS ADDR, SCHE_CON, SCHE_RES , TO_CHAR(SCHE_SDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SDATE, TO_CHAR(SCHE_SDATE,'HH24:MI:SS') AS STIME,TO_CHAR(SCHE_EDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EDATE,TO_CHAR(SCHE_EDATE,'HH24:MI:SS') AS ETIME, SCHE_IMPORTANCE FROM SCHE SC INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON SC.SCHE_DIV_NO = CC.CODE_S_CATE AND CC.CODE_L_CATE = 2 INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE CD ON SCHE_ACTI_NO = CD.CODE_S_CATE AND CD.CODE_L_CATE = 3 INNER JOIN EMP_INFO EI ON SC.EMP_NO = EI.EMP_NO WHERE SCHE_NO = #{sche_no}

SELECT SCI.SCHE_CI_PARTICIPANT, CI.CLIENT_NAME, CP.COMP_NAME, CI.CLIENT_NO FROM SCHE_CLIENT_INFO SCI LEFT OUTER JOIN CLIENT CI ON SCI.CLIENT_NO = CI.CLIENT_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN COMP CP ON CI.COMP_NO = CP.COMP_NO WHERE SCI.SCHE_NO = #{sche_no}

SELECT LEAD_NAME, EMP_NAME,SCHE_CI_PARTICIPANT,SL.LEAD_NO FROM SCHE_LEAD SL INNER JOIN LEAD LD ON SL.LEAD_NO = LD.LEAD_NO INNER JOIN EMP_INFO EI ON LD.EMP_NO = EI.EMP_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN SCHE_CLIENT_INFO SCI ON SL.SCHE_NO = SCI.SCHE_NO WHERE SL.SCHE_NO = #{sche_no}

SELECT CHN_NAME, EMP_NAME,SCHE_CI_PARTICIPANT,SC.CHN_NO FROM SCHE_CHN SC INNER JOIN BSS_CHN BC ON SC.CHN_NO = BC.CHN_NO INNER JOIN EMP_INFO EI ON BC.EMP_NO = EI.EMP_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN SCHE_CLIENT_INFO SCI ON SC.SCHE_NO = SCI.SCHE_NO WHERE SC.SCHE_NO = #{sche_no}

SELECT SCHE_ATTACH_NO,EI.TEAM_NO,SCHE_ATTACH_NAME, EMP_NAME || ' ' || EMP_POSI_NAME AS EMP,EI.EMP_NO, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DT FROM SCHE_ATTACH SA INNER JOIN SCHE SC ON SA.SCHE_NO = SC.SCHE_NO INNER JOIN EMP_INFO EI ON SC.EMP_NO = EI.EMP_NO INNER JOIN EMP_POSI EP ON EI.EMP_POSI_NO = EP.EMP_POSI_NO WHERE SA.SCHE_NO = #{sche_no} ORDER BY SA.SCHE_ATTACH_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ML WHERE SCHE_NO = #{sche_no} AND ML_DEL_YN = 1

SELECT ML_NO,ML_NAME,EMP_NAME || ' ' || EMP_POSI_NAME AS EMP,TO_CHAR(ML_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ML_DATE,EMP_INFO.EMP_NO,TEAM_NO FROM ML INNER JOIN EMP_INFO ON ML.EMP_NO = EMP_INFO.EMP_NO INNER JOIN EMP_POSI ON EMP_INFO.EMP_POSI_NO = EMP_POSI.EMP_POSI_NO WHERE ML.SCHE_NO = #{sche_no} AND ML.ML_DEL_YN = 1 ORDER BY ML_NO DESC

SELECT GOODS_NO,SERVICE_NO,EI.TEAM_NO ,PROD_NAME,EMP_NAME || ' ' || EMP_POSI_NAME AS EMP, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DT,EI.EMP_NO, PR.DIV_NO,SP.SCHE_PROD_NO FROM SCHE_PROD SP INNER JOIN SCHE SC ON SP.SCHE_NO = SC.SCHE_NO INNER JOIN EMP_INFO EI ON SC.EMP_NO = EI.EMP_NO INNER JOIN EMP_POSI EP ON EI.EMP_POSI_NO = EP.EMP_POSI_NO INNER JOIN PROD PR ON SP.PROD_NO = PR.PROD_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN GOODS GD ON PR.PROD_NO = GD.PROD_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN SERVICE SR ON PR.PROD_NO = SR.PROD_NO WHERE SP.SCHE_NO = #{sche_no} ORDER BY SP.SCHE_PROD_NO DESC
